question: Will BTC close higher today (UTC close vs prior UTC close)?

news.title: BTC ticks up on ETF flow chatter

description: Binary UP/DOWN market that settles on the BTC UTC daily close versus the prior day's close.

description: Daily ETH UP/DOWN close relative to prior close.

question: Will BTC trade at or above $100,000 before the end of the month?

description: Resolves Yes if any reputable composite or index records >= $100,000 intraday before the deadline.

question: Will SOL reach $300 before year-end?
description: Yes if SOL touches $300 on any reputable price source before the stated deadline.

question: What will the Fed do at the next FOMC meeting?

news.title: Traders price in hold for October

description: Resolves to the policy rate action stated in the FOMC statement at decision time.

question: Will US CPI headline this month be >= 0.4% m/m?
description: Resolves using the BLS CPI press release table for the month in question.

question: Will the SEC approve another spot crypto ETF before Nov 30, 2025?
description: Yes if an SEC order notice confirms approval of any new spot crypto ETF by the deadline.
